website_summaries.verdict: These carbide rotary burrs out-perform many of their higher-priced competitors. They're sharp, they cut a variety of soft and hard materials, and they wear slowly.
pros: Includes 8 popular heads for grinding, deburring and other jobs
A good choice for porting heads
cons: Occasionally you will find a burr that's off-center

customer_reviews.title: 3 burrs have issues.
customer_reviews.text: An OK set. After careful inspection, 3 of the burrs have issues. Larger cylindrical burr can cut with about 1/4 of the circumference; the other 3/4 of the circumference have inadequate cutting edges (which I tried to photograph and highlight a bit at random) from the off-center forming process, so 3/4 of the edges will end up rubbing against the material instead of removing it. Smaller cylindrical burr will cut with about 2/3 of the circumference for the same reason. Larger ball burr has an air pocket at the brazing. It's probably on there well enough and won't fly off, but who knows until that happens... Got to wear protection! Other burrs in the set have good cutting edges.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Metal Eraser!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mechanic and have been using these types of bits for years for various tasks. I've owned some that wear quickly and some that are out of balance and hop all over. These Carbide Burrs are Top quality and very effective. I am using them to Port a set of Olds 455 Cylinder Heads and boy do they remove some metal (at a very controllable rate(no hopping or surprise runaway)) After finishing the Exhaust casting humps I Inspected the Bit and It's in perfect shape. I will update 6 months from now after I throw these things through my daily routine for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Albatross

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: These grinder bits are awesome for the price. I work in a machine shop and my boss buys high dollar burr grinder bits to use. I wanted some for home use so I got these and they work equally as well as the high dollar ones. My guess would be they are all made in the same place and one is marked up and the other isn't. If you need burr grinder bits, these are the ones to get.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Cuts anything and stays sharp
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed how well these have been performing for being only $5.25 per bit. These are the absolute cheapest I have found but I have compared them to $20 US made bits and I can't tell the difference. I've used one bit for several hours on hardened steel valve seats and they still cut like new. I may buy another set just to keep around.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bits are amazing! Super sharp. Cuts as well as other expensive carbides!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: These eat steel for breakfast. I normally break out my die grinder sparingly cause i hate to use up my bits for some simple projects. Now I find myself going to the die grinder more and more for situations because these little guys do such a quick job. I've used the big name brand ones and these are better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Knarr

customer_reviews.title: They remained sharp and perform better than another set of rotary files that cost 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set about 8 years ago. I've used them on a weekly basis every since with no issues whatsoever. They remained sharp and perform better than another set of rotary files that cost 3 times as much. I recently purchased 2 more sets for employees. I use them to widen the holes in strike plates for door locks.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Best cheap tools I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best cheap tools I ever bought, worked perfect for polishing tight cast aluminum corners, they bite really good, so be skilled or you will ruin your project. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Robertson

customer_reviews.title: ... these as they are pricey elsewhere i was very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe the price on these as they are pricey elsewhere i was very happy with this order
customer_reviews.author: RDC

customer_reviews.title: Nice set !
customer_reviews.text: I've used dozens of different burr sets over the years and these hold us as well as any set I've had. Nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: sweetlex5280

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these on 4130 steel and they just work – thought about getting a spare set, thinking the 4130 would wear them prematurely, but so far I can’t tell them from new.
customer_reviews.author: Geriatric Suthriner

customer_reviews.title: I love those carbide burrs
customer_reviews.text: I love those carbide burrs. I have had to grind the remains of 5 studs out of a wheel and a thermostat housing that had a stuck bolt. The ones I used showed no signs of wear so it seems like I'll get a good life out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Xman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good set
customer_reviews.text: These were shipped quickly. Holder/case works good still. Good variety of burrs. They came sharp & still are. Much cheaper than buying individually. They spin true. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: badone07

customer_reviews.title: Great rough-cut burrs
customer_reviews.text: I'll go along with everyone else. Super rough-cut burrs for a great price. I have cut all sorts of iron and steel. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: I. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: These carbide rotary cutting burs work excellent -fast and clean cutting
customer_reviews.text: These carbide rotary cutting burs work excellent -fast and clean cutting. As a wood carver/sculptor I use them primarily for carving, shaping, smoothing and detailing in wood, but do occasional use on metal they work very good. An exceptionally good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mark bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: 1/4" Shank limits use with all tools. I would have returned if not in identified in submenu descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: they worked fine one was slightly off center. but not by much.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These are great for many projects. Wood, Metal, Bondo slow drill or die grinder no problems.
customer_reviews.author: master craftsman

customer_reviews.title: you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of things off of Amazon but this is my first review because this set definitely deserves it.I'm using these on some hi nickel content heads they're supposed to be very hard. This burr set cuts through the metal just fine
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Great burr set.
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive burr set, this one seems to do the job just fine. I've had them for about 2 months and I use them everyday. One thing, not too good on aluminum. They get gummed up quickly. All in all, no problems and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Best deal out there for the money, super sharp too. There are better carbide burrs out there for a whole lot more money!
customer_reviews.author: marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bits work very well, I use them to grind down welds and such.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good for my project
customer_reviews.text: Works good for my project. What porting Cast Iron heads they aren't that long but they do remove a lot of material
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: The items were received promptly and worked great .modified the head of my engine in no time at all. Outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Notta

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been great. Working well! I will have to see how long they will last but right now I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Al Iandoli

customer_reviews.title: great bargin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for deburring cast steel,All I can say is they do their job well and have shown no sign of wear,which is the least I can say for some of the other garbage that I've bought in the past.good quality product and I would recommend it if your on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: lionel

customer_reviews.title: the carbide bits are a great buy
customer_reviews.text: The bits work great especially for the price. Im a mechanic and use these bits alot and so far no complaints. Beats paying snap-on $50.00 per bit.
customer_reviews.author: rich caruso

customer_reviews.title: very solid tools
customer_reviews.text: i purchase the 8 -PC carbide burr set and ported a set of gt40 cast iron head and these tool did a wonderful job and you cant go wrong with this set AAAAAAAA+++++++
customer_reviews.author: roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: Carbide Burr Set
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a while for a set like this to port match a set of heads on my 67 mustang 289. I was very pleased with these burrs for they got the job done. If you are a weekend warrior like myself you will love this set of burrs. For the price and the quality I would highly recommend to a friend. I would have given a 5 star if it would have had a nice case and not just a flimsy plastic one. Just saying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darkcityavenger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Literally the lowest price I could find on a 1/4" set and they actually turned out to work quite well. Take it slow if you have to deburr steel/iron. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he loves it and uses it all the time. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Sochia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Rotary Burr Set
customer_reviews.text: Borrowed my friends burr set far too many times so finally realized I needed to get my own. Nice red storage box like you see in the picture (no lid/cover) They hold up well and I have yet to dull any of them down yet. Foreign made unfortunately. Identical to my buddies set he bought off the tool truck for a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper0702

customer_reviews.title: Great burr bits
customer_reviews.text: These are great bits, nice for cutting and grinding down metal from steel, to Stainless Steel. works well with air grinders.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Foster

product_meta.title: Grip 8 pc Double Carbide Rotary Burr Set
product_meta.description: Ideal for use in deburring steel, cast iron, and other ferrous metal parts and objects. Precision grounded for vibration free operation. Heat treated steel for added strength and durability. Includes: 1 pc 1/2” x 1” cylindrical shape, 1 pc 3/8” x 3/4” cylindrical shape, 1 pc 3/8” x 3/4” cylindrical radius end, 1 pc 1/4” x 5/8” cylindrical radius end, 1 pc 1/4” ball shape, 1 pc 3/8” ball shape, 1 pc 3/8” x 3/4” tree shaped radius end, 1/2” x 1” tree shaped radius end. Also includes blow mold storage tray

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars56 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
